hero.title: Your Journey to Wellness Starts Here
hero.description: Comprehensive support and resources for menopause health. Join our community and take control of your wellbeing with expert guidance and compassionate care.

valueProposition.subtitle: Reason why
valueProposition.title: WHY YOU NEED TO JOIN?
valueProposition.heading: THE BIGGEST MENOPAUSE SOCIETY IN HONG KONG
valueProposition.description: We are the biggest menopause society in Hong Kong, dedicated to supporting, educating, and empowering women through every stage of menopause.

services.title: DISCOVER THE HONG KONG MENOPAUSE SOCIETY
services.subtitle: Explore a community dedicated to supporting women through every stage of menopause in Hong Kong

community.title: Community Platform
community.description: Explore a community dedicated to supporting women through every stage of menopause in Hong Kong.

events.title: Events
events.description: Join workshops, talks, and gatherings designed to educate and empower women.

medical.title: Medical Support
medical.description: Access trusted medical information and professional support tailored to menopause care.

cta.description: We are the biggest menopause society in Hong Kong, dedicated to supporting, educating, and empowering women through every stage of menopause.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our society

join.question: Why do we have to join The Hong Kong Menopause Society?
join.answer: We are the biggest menopause society in Hong Kong, dedicated to supporting, educating, and empowering women through every stage of menopause.

payment.question: Do I have to pay to join the community?
payment.answer: Some resources are free, while premium programs, events, or medical support services may require a membership or fee.

areas.question: Which areas in Hong Kong does the community serve?
areas.answer: Our community serves women across all districts of Hong Kong, both online and through selected offline events.

support.question: How can I get help if my question is not listed?
support.answer: You can contact our team directly through the Contact Us page, and we will be happy to assist you.

upcomingEvent.title: WATCH MENOPAUSE MOVIE
upcomingEvent.description: Explore community dedicated to supporting women through every stage of menopause in Hong Kong

page.description: Join our community events, workshops, and gatherings designed to educate, empower, and support women through menopause.

testimonial.title: From Our Community

alice.quote: I finally feel understood and confident navigating menopause. Highly recommended!
